description:
Yaegashi worries he isn`t pulling his weight with the TAC and hopes to prove himself with some new tech.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Complicated and Hard to Understand! Being a Man Puts You Into Such a Difficult Position!
Compliqué et difficile à comprendre ! Être un homme met en position difficile !
フクザツ! 難解! 男はつらいね?!
